date: Thu Jul 07 2022 03:23:51 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)
pageTitle: Lindsey Graham subpoena by grand jury
description: Sen. Lindsey Graham, Rudy Giuliani and attorneys affiliated with former President Donald Trump received subpoenas from a Georgia grand jury on election meddling inquiry.  Attorneys representing Graham say that he intends to challenge the subpoena.  Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger said the senator called asking him about potentially throwing away ballots.
metaDescription: An illustration of Donald Trump affiliated Sen. Lindsey Graham who received a subpoena from a Georgia grand jury on election meddling inquiry.
topicText: Sen. Lindsey Graham, Rudy Giuliani and attorneys affiliated with former President Donald Trump received subpoenas from a Georgia grand jury election meddling inquiry.  Attorneys representing Graham say that he intends to challenge the subpoena.  Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger said the senator called asking him about potentially throwing away ballots.
